Reviews.Title: HP EliteBook Notebook8440p Intel i5 2400 MHz 250 gig
Reviews.Author: Lorraine Wagner
Reviews.Content: I purchased this HP Elitebook Notebook 8440p intel i5 2400 MHz 250gig,  I thought it was a laptop which it is but not as big as a laptop.  This laptop is a little smaller than other laptops, So far so good no compliments, I like it, since I don't do much on it, other than check email, and look for stuff on the internet, the screen is a little small my other computer compaq is a little bigger than this, the price was right, and in my range so that is why I bought it....If you don't use the computer that much and use it just for home purposes, like I do then I would suggest to purchase one of these Elitebook notebook... If you need one for work, then I would say purchase a bigger Laptop with more memory & ram...  So I am happy with my new HP Elitebook Notebook, The only problem it does not have is the 10-key on the right hand side, especially when I am used to using one...

ProductInfo.Features:
Processor - Intel i5 2400 MHz || Memory Installed - 4096mb DDR3 > Upgradeable to 8192MB
Hard Drive - 250Gig Serial ATA || Optical Drive - DVD-RW || Screen Size - 14.0" WideScreen LCD
Internet Connection(s) - The installed 802 11 ABG WI-FI card will allow you to connect to any available wireless network, and the internal Ethernet port will allow a high speed wired connection
Software Installed - NEW Windows 7 Home Premium 32 Bit, word document & spreadsheet applications, shortcut to Microsofts free virus protection along with a restore partition on the hard drive for easy reinstallation. All software is Genuine!!
What's in the Box? - HP EliteBook 8440p with NEW pre-installed software, power cord, software registration instructions and a 60 day Warranty
ProductInfo.Name: HP EliteBook 8440p Intel i5 2400 MHz 250Gig Serial ATA HDD 4096mb DDR3 DVD-RW Wireless WI-FI 14.0" WideScreen LCD Genuine Windows 7 Home Premium 32 Bit Laptop Notebook Computer
